text: Jorge Cubero Gálvez (born 6 November 1992 in Baena) is a Spanish cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . In August 2018, he was named in the startlist for the Vuelta a España. ==Career achievements== ===Major results=== ;2018 : Vuelta a España ::20px Combativity award, Stages 6 & 8 ;2019 : 20px Combativity award Stage 4 Vuelta a España ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2018 ! scope="col" | 2019 |- style="text- align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |89 |136 |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Jorge Cubero
